mapper.select: select t.*,ur.role_id,s.USERNAME AS staffName from tb_user t LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON t.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN base_staff s ON s.MOBILE = t.mobile where t.mobile = #{value} limit 1
select t.*,ur.role_id,s.USERNAME AS staffName from tb_user t LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON t.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN base_staff s ON s.MOBILE = t.mobile where t.open_id = #{openId} limit 1

select t.name,t.url,t.icon from sys_menu t INNER JOIN sys_role_menu t1 ON t.menu_id = t1.menu_id INNER JOIN sys_role t2 ON t1.role_id = t2.role_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role t3 ON t2.role_id = t3.role_id INNER JOIN tb_user t4 ON t3.user_id = t4.user_id WHERE t4.open_id = #{openId}
select COUNT(1) from base_staff t where t.mobile = #{mobile}
select * from base_staff t where t.mobile = #{mobile} limit 1
